text:
Hello. Look around. What colours can you see?
Can you find… something pink, pink, pink,

pink, pink, pink, whoh yeah! Pink, pink, pink,
pink, pink, pink, yeah yeah, yeah! It´s pink.

It´s pink. It´s pink. Whow, yeah! It´s
pink. It´s pink. It´s pink. Yeah, yeah,

yeah!
Something orange, orange, orange, orange,

orange, orange, yeah! Something orange, orange,
orange, orange, orange, orange, whow yeah!

It´s orange! It´s orange! It´s orange!
Whow, yeah! It´s orange. It´s orange! It´s

orange! Yeah, yeah, yeah!
Yeah! Now find… something brown, brown,

brown, brown, brown, brown yeah! Something
brown, brown, brown, brown, brown, brown,

whow yeah! It´s brown! It´s brown! It´s
brown! Whow, yeah! It´s brown! It´s brown!
